data.name: Bookshelf: Keep only multiple books in a dictionary
data.description:
Nyagoah loves career advice books.
If she likes one, she buys other books from the same author.

If the advice didn't help her career, she only keeps the single book and doesn't bother buying more.


Once in a while she gives away all the solitary books from her shelf to a book swap.

Eject all the single books from her bookshelf!



Write a function that deletes all authors books from the dictionary whose value is 1 or less.

{'Megan Fernandes': 2, 'Rayner Teo':1, 'Bell Hooks':4}

=>

{'Megan Fernandes': 2, 'Bell Hooks':4}

Keep the order of the keys, you don't wanna mess up Nyagoahs Bookshelf!
